description: Unique row identifier for a localized label or field definition within a label set; used to reference this entry across the application.
Reference to the parent localization/label file this entry belongs to, grouping related UI text for specific modules or languages.
Entry identifier within the parent file, often used for stable ordering or lookups of specific text tokens; confirm exact usage with SME.
Human-readable text shown to users (label, caption, or message) on fleet management screens and reports.
Formatting template with placeholders indicating how runtime values are inserted into the display text.
Alternate text used when the entry is rendered in menus or navigation contexts; may be null when not applicable.
Internal key or property name that maps this text to a specific data field or UI element in the application.
Numeric sequence controlling the position this field or label appears within a screen, form, or section.
Likely rendering or validation flags affecting how the field is displayed (e.g., required, formatting, currency); confirm with SME.
Likely additional UI flags or parameters for this entry; confirm with SME.
UI control identifier associated with this entry, linking the text to a specific widget on a screen.
